name: European Lasers, Photonics and Optics Technologies Summit
content: Magnus Group Conferences would like to extend the arms and heartily welcomes you to the “European Lasers, Photonics and Optics Technologies Summit” which is set to hit the calendar on September 22-23, 2021 at Paris, France. The conference theme is “Multifaceted aspects of Lasers, Photonics & Optics Technologies”. ELOS-2021 has an overall goal of amalgamating the researches, scientists, and academicians to discuss and share knowledge in the emerging field of Lasers optics and photonics. Laser and optical science are absolutely essential to performing applied research in field of Physics, providing basic analysis tools. Photonics conference 2021 principally covers a range of topics that are pointing to Lasers optics and its related areas of research. These new innovations and presentations will help to establish a basic knowledge to all the representatives. Recommended: Optics Conferences 2021 | Photonics Conferences | International Optics Conferences | Lasers Events | Lasers Conferences 2021 | Photonics Conferences 2021 | Optics 2021 | Optics Meetings | Lasers Meetings | Photonics Meetings
